description: Identifies when a device in azure is no longer managed or compliant Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Administrator may have forgotten to review the device.
name: Azure Device No Longer Managed or Compliant
query: properties.message:("Device\ no\ longer\ compliant" OR "Device\ no\ longer\ managed")
